subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Vinny Testaverde jokes never seem to stop: He once handed off to Bronko Nagurski; he was in the same draft class as Y.A. Tittle.
snippet: The Vinny Testaverde jokes never seem to stop: He once handed off to Bronko Nagurski; he was in the same draft class as Y.A. Tittle.
